<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CLARY: Friends, I have seen quite a few containers and scrolls blocking the path of the <color=orange>Hanging City Highway.</color>
2
1
CLARY: Kindly retrieve these scrolls and possessions if they belong to you. It is not a good first impression to ask our visitors to jump over clutter on the <color=orange>Hanging City Highway!</color>
Workshop R3 8
